intro:

post.body: This is the "topic" for suggestions and discussions about Universal Smart Video format. Please comment.

Discussion forum of USV:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/forum.usvformat.bit/
You can post suggestions and other discussions.
The first USV muted-looping animation is comming.

comment.body:
@Styromaniac: In JPEG, the number of progressive levels supported is define by Image, and the progressive decoding method is increasing resolution. PNG supports 7 levels and the method is interlacing.
The method of JPEG is very better to view, instead of PNG that is pixelated when in progressive.
But currently USV will support only PNG as photo format because it is open. If we find any open format that is seamless to JPEG, it will be included.
The progressive mode depends on the player/coded, not in USV.
@Styromaniac: Support APNG images is a good idea, but yet isn't in focus of development. Thanks for your suggestion. Animated PNG can be implemented in a future.
